name: deimosrising
text: Philippe has a surprisingly strong conception of partying

name: cicadalek
text: I blame Lyle. The kid already knows subconciously what makes a good party due to his influence.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Good party = Huge amount of alcohol

name: aliiis
text: and also music playing!

name: patiently56
text: he was channeled by the spirit of billy idol once.

name: wonelove
text: PHILIPPE, THIS IS NO WAY TO PARTY

name: jhunt
text: This is still crazier than my bachelor party. Shoot.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by enough_talk, straw, goocifer, farqussus, LuckyG, the_dingle, Zem, gkiyo)

name: jamers
text: This makes me doubt that if Ray ever settles down he'll let Beef plan his Bachelor's party. Serious doubts.

name: ssddr
text: This comic is a farce as Philippe has no fingers

name: silver_lake
text: He merely folds his flipper to a point in the middle. Hate will always find a way.

name: zek
text: Incidentally, this is exactly what he's doing in response to Beef's way lame party.

name: dak
text: Also, see the alt text of the next day's strip

name: madnes
text: I do not like what Beef's jaw does when he exhales smoke.

name: tinhand
text:
I feel so sorry for Philippe in this strip. Even when Roast Beef is trying to have a party he manages to make it depressing.
And Roast Beefs jaw in panel 2 is a good thing. You can imagine it falling off.

name: songbirdspectre
text: it looks like a bean.

name: songbirdspectre
text: many people i know think that bachelor parties are a poor idea. i do not know how i feel about the subject.

name: aelindil
text: If you ever get engaged, you will spontaneously erupt with opinion.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: That was insane

name: biddlebubbly
text: I went to rate this a 5 but I had already rated it a 5. That's a good sign for a strip.

name: molesticide
text:
oh SICK right as i read 'middle finger' in the last panel, kool g rap said it on my speakers.

at the SAME TIME i am freaking out.

name: zzzleepy
text: there wasn't any music playing, but oh man you can imagine if there had

name: boredom_man
text:
than it would be a good day for a white wedding


oh god

name: c_dizzle
text: apparently sticking your middle finger up lacks the neccessary rudeness unless there's music playing.

name: pokypig
text: Now I totally understand why Beef is one of the dirtiest dudes in town. Bitchin', man.

name: jthm_guitarist
text: So Roast Beef is more bad than Philippe?

name: pzukowski
text: Lamest bachelor party ever!

name: lux
text: Beef doesn't correct Lie Bot. Is that cruelty to Philippe...? He completely plays along.

name: theoddwaffle
text: I don't think Beef would make a very good father, but it wouldn't be for lack of trying.

name: dumase
text: This bachelor party was a lot more exciting than Beef's.

name: tekende
text: The party is a mild affair. Beef does not wish to end up being sorry for partying.

name: i_love_kate
text: Sorry for... Oh, right.

name: mikeronomicon
text: On his last night of freedom all little Philipe wanted was to smash things.

name: jaldor
text: I don't know, I think setting off a firecracker inside is pretty bad. My mom would be pissed at least. Not that I live with me mom or nothin'. I'm just crashing there until I can get back on my feet. Times have been tough since I got laid off from CostCo, get off my back woman! Fine. Go. Walk out like all the others. God I'm so lonely.

name: tekende
text: That's a waste of a perfectly good Dorito, Beef.

name: wallabeechamp
text: I can't believe Roast Beef is trying to teach Philippe how to party! That alone is hysterical!

name: all-star951
text: One of the older Achewoods, but still one of my favourites.
